section.title: Creating a Virtual Machine Network Quality of Service Entry
section.para: Create a virtual machine network quality of service entry to regulate network traffic when applied to a virtual network interface controller (vNIC) profile, also known as a virtual machine network interface profile.

procedure.title: Creating a Virtual Machine Network Quality of Service Entry

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select a data center.
Click the QoS tab in the details pane.
Enter a name for the virtual machine network quality of service entry in the Name field.
Enter the limits for the Inbound and Outbound network traffic.

section.para: You have created a virtual machine network quality of service entry that can be used in a virtual network interface controller.
